TopicTitle: Can't Launch! Craft is too heavy?

Articles.Content:
I have downloaded a KSP 1.3.1 Energia Buran Space Shuttle by SpaceTrashCan (https://kerbalx.com/SpaceTrashCan/Energia-Buran), but when I try too launch it says "The Launch pad can't support vessels heavier than 34028232346638529000000000000000000000t total mass is NaNt". Anyone have any clue what this means and why I am getting this?

Edited February 3, 2018 by Yama_LP
have you upgraded the launchpad building with right click?
This is a serious bug. Contact the craft creator, and contact the authors of all the mods you own.
